text_label: Tyrion Lannister was Lord for the House Lannister and was also known in the whole kingdom as a murderer. The evil Daenerys Targaryen one day posed a threat to the freedom of Tyrion Lannister. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Myrcella Baratheon, Tyrion Lannister learnt the power of fire sorcery. During a long training session in Oldstones at the Autumnal Equinox, Tyrion Lannister met Cersei Lannister. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in Oldstones at sunrise , Tyrion Lannister faced Daenerys Targaryen . With the help of Cersei Lannister and thanks to the learnt power of fire sorcery , the alliance scared away  Daenerys Targaryen . This is how Tyrion Lannister managed to save the beloved the treasure. In The Eyrie celebrated with  Cersei Lannister by organizing a concert .

text_label: A long time ago Bran Stark, Lord from the House Stark, was known to be very good as a a prophet. The evil Margaery Tyrell one day posed a threat to the jewel of Bran Stark. Bran Stark did not know what to do and went to Queen regnant to seek help. Queen regnant was a master of invisibility and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to The Dreadfort at the Winter Solstice, Bran Stark met Arya Stark and they immediately became friends. Finally in The Dreadfort at sunrise , Bran Stark faced Margaery Tyrell . With the help of Arya Stark and thanks to the learnt power of invisibility , the alliance scared away  Margaery Tyrell . Eventually the jewel was safe again. Bran Stark and Arya Stark went to Kings Landing and celebrated by watching a play.

text_label: A long time ago Jon Snow, King from the House Stark, was known to be very good as a a spy. Everything was quiet when one day Cersei Lannister threatened The House of Jon Snow. Jon Snow did not know what to do and went to Eddard Stark to seek help. Eddard Stark was a master of fire sorcery and taught the hero all its secrets. On the way to Castle Black at the first day of Spring, Jon Snow met Rhaella Targaryen and they immediately became friends. At sunrise, Jon Snow and Rhaella Targaryen were almost in Karhold when they realized Cersei Lannister was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Jon Snow used fire sorcery forcing the enemy to retreat. This is how Jon Snow managed to save the beloved the treasure. In Great Sept of Baelor celebrated with  Rhaella Targaryen by making fireworks .

text_label: Petyr Baelish was Lord for the House Tyrell and was also known in the whole kingdom as a bureaucrat. Petyr Baelish was having an happy and peaceful life when Jon Snow threatened  the jewel of Petyr Baelish . Initially Petyr Baelish was afraid, but with the help of Cassana Baratheon got stronger and learnt fire sorcery. During a long training session in Kings Landing at the Summer Solstice, Petyr Baelish met Robert Arryn. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. At sunrise, Petyr Baelish and Robert Arryn were almost in Red Keep when they realized Jon Snow was after them. The two friends nevertheless were ready and the battle begun. Petyr Baelish used fire sorcery forcing the enemy to retreat. After the victory, the castle was not under treat anymore. Petyr Baelish and Robert Arryn celebrated in Winterfell with  having a feast

text_label: A long time ago Margaery Tyrell, Queen consort from the House Tyrell, was known to be very good as an influencer. The evil Daenerys Targaryen one day posed a threat to The House of Margaery Tyrell. Margaery Tyrell did not know what to do and went to Hizdahr zo Loraq to seek help. Hizdahr zo Loraq was a master of slowing Time and taught the hero all its secrets. During a long training session in Kings Landing at the Winter Solstice, Margaery Tyrell met Loras Tyrell. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. Finally in Bear Island at the first day of Spring , Margaery Tyrell faced Daenerys Targaryen . With the help of Loras Tyrell and thanks to the learnt power of slowing Time , the alliance scared away  Daenerys Targaryen . After the victory, the jewel was not under treat anymore. Margaery Tyrell and Loras Tyrell celebrated in Kings Landing with listening to a storytelling

text_label: Once upon a time, there was a prophet whose name was Bran Stark. Bran Stark was a Lord from the House Stark. Everything was quiet when one day Petyr Baelish threatened the peace of Bran Stark. Our hero was not ready to fight for it, but with the help of  Steffon Baratheon, Bran Stark learnt the power of teleportation. During a long training session in Bear Island at the Summer Solstice, Bran Stark met Arya Stark. They immediately got along and decided to travel together. After travelling across all the kingdom, Bran Stark with the help of Arya Stark finally found Petyr Baelish in Bear Island. A bloody battle begun but Bran Stark thanks to teleportation powers got the better of Petyr Baelish. After the victory, the castle was not under treat anymore. Bran Stark and Arya Stark celebrated in The Twins with listening to a storytelling
